vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰώδα (Rec. Ἰούδα),
Joda Luk.3:26.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Joda, a person in Jesus' genealogy
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26;
son of: Joanan (G2490);
father of: Josech (G2501K)
§ Joda, a person in Jesus' genealogy
Some manuscripts list Ἰούδας (G2455) in place of G6043 at Luk.3.26
